about_me.en:
I am now an associate professor of the School of Informatics at Xiamen University. I obtained my B.S. degree in Mathematics and Applied Mathematics from University of Electronic Science and Technology of China (UESTC), and Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from Tsinghua University. I was a postdoctoral fellow in the Department of Computer Science and Engineering at The Chinese University of Hong Kong.
My current research interests include designing and building secure and dependable techniques for large-scale storage systems and data centers.
about_me.zh:
我现在是厦门大学信息学院的副教授。我获得了电子科技大学数学与应用数学学士学位，清华大学计算机科学博士学位。我曾在香港中文大学计算机科学与工程系做博士后研究员。
我的研究兴趣包括设计和构建大规模存储系统和数据中心的安全可靠技术。

en: Research Fellowship Scheme, The Chinese University of Hong Kong

about_me.en: I am Zhisheng Chen. I received my Ph.D. in Computer Science and Technology from Fuzhou University in 2023, under the supervision of Professors Wenzhong Guo and Gengeng Liu. Currently, I am a postdoctoral researcher at the School of Informatics at Xiamen University. My current research focuses on the intelligent design of microfluidic biochips and intelligent storage of chips.
about_me.zh: 我是陈志盛。我于2023年在福州大学获得计算机科学与技术博士学位，导师是郭文忠教授和刘根庚教授。目前，我是厦门大学信息学院的博士后研究员。我的研究方向是微流控生物芯片的智能设计和芯片的智能存储。
